description:
With the approaching class vote, a disturbing atmosphere hangs over Class C and fills them with suspicion. Second-year Class A`s Asahina informs Ayanokoji that Ichinose has asked for cooperation from student council president Nagumo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito wa Mizukara no Honshitsu to Mukiau no o Sakeru Tame Nara, Donna Oroka na Okonai ni mo Te o Somete Shimau
Les gens feront n’importe quoi, peu importe l’absurdité, afin d’éviter de faire face à leur propre âme
People Will Do Anything, No Matter How Absurd, in Order to Avoid Facing Their Own Souls.
人は自らの本質と向き合うのを避けるためなら, どんな愚かな行いにも手を染めてしまう
